about_the_game:
Please note that the English version is still under development.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------

"Protagonist finds a cheat code, unlocking a life of overpowered abilities." It seems to be a common plot device in cultivation-themed works. But if you were to play the role of the cheat code, could you help the "protagonist" reach the pinnacle of life?


In the game, you play as a "Former High-Level Cultivator," whose physical body is destroyed, cultivation level has plummeted, and is forced to reside within a ring as a "Spirit." You become a cooperative partner with the person who finds the ring, hoping to assist the "host" in rapid growth with your insights and experiences, in the anticipation that they will eventually help you break free from your constraints and regain your former glory. However, things don't seem as straightforward as expected.



As a ring without a physical body, you may possess extensive knowledge and skills, but the ultimate decisions and actions must be made by your "Master". You become a strong support for the master, providing guidance in cultivation and combat, helping them navigate various unexpected situations during their adventure, and utilizing your unique abilities to enhance their progress.



In the game, you will encounter various characters with diverse personalities, including the clever and cunning ones as well as the stubborn and dull ones. Not everyone is easy to deal with.
Will you choose to teach them according to their aptitude, patiently guide them, and gradually earn their trust? Or will you choose to remain passive and let them figure things out on their own? (Or perhaps you will press the fast-forward button on their lives...??)



The world of cultivation is cruel, and your "Master" may perish due to various circumstances. But as an immortal ring, you are eternal. While assisting your host, you gradually regain your own abilities, patiently waiting for the right moment to return to your peak.

Notice to players


This game does not contain:
  • Waifu
  • Romance
  • Enjoy killing enemys
  • The sanity of the developer

This game contains:
  • Old man
  • Magical Ring
  • PPT level drama performance
  • A lot of WTF
  • Bugsssss
